title: Billionaire-Funded ‘Trump Accounts’ for Kids Slammed as 'Another Tax Shelter' for the Rich
description: After Silicon Valley CEO Michael Dell and his wife, philanthropist Susan Dell, announced Tuesday their plan to invest $250 billion in seed money in individual investment accounts for 25 million American children, adding to the number of kids who would receive…
